name: Trangles
description:
Welcome to Trangles this is my first game ever and we are going to make it fully featured with everything you guys recommend and more hope to see you in the comments :)

Gameplay:

enemies: slow square, runner square 

enemies in development: tower square, runner square with square gun 

our level 5 boss is also in development 

triangle, this is our main character

triangle king: he got his kingdom took over by squares LOL

Main Menu:

the help button does not work yet it is also in development

the start button works of course

Music:

we are in desperate need of a sound track if anyone can help us out send a comment and we will try to get to you as fast as we can 

NOTICE:

this is not the final version of our game we just wanted to get this game out so we could see if we could get any feedback on it before we decide to go all the way with this game if you do download it don't be afraid to comment thank you :)
